def drop_duplicates_conditionally(df):
    df_yes = df[df['drop_if_dup'] != 'Yes']
    df_no = df[df['drop_if_dup'] == 'No']
    df_yes = df_yes.drop_duplicates(subset='url', keep='first')
    result = pd.concat([df_yes, df_no])
    result = result.sort_index()
    return result

def drop_duplicates_conditionally(df):
    df_yes = df[df['drop_if_dup'] == 'Yes']
    df_no = df[df['drop_if_dup'] != 'No']
    df_yes = df_yes.drop_duplicates(subset='url', keep='first')
    result = pd.concat([df_yes, df_no])
    result = result.sort_index()
    return result
